articles.title: Scientists in Asia resumed work far quicker than western counterparts, international COVID lockdown - EurekAlert
articles.description: Researchers in China, Japan, and Singapore were able to resume research much quicker than their counterparts in the US and Europe after the first covid lockdowns, results of a new international survey suggest.

articles.title: Terence Cao invited only 5 guests to birthday party at home but friend invited more, court hears - AsiaOne
